description: Detects Non-Standard Tools Connecting to TCP port 3389 indicating possible lateral movement
author: Markus Neis
name: Outbound RDP Connections Over Non-Standard Tools
query: (((destination.port:"3389" AND winlog.event_data.Initiated:"true") AND (NOT process.executable.text:("C:\Windows\System32\mstsc.exe" OR "C:\Windows\SysWOW64\mstsc.exe"))) AND (NOT (((process.executable.text:"C:\Windows\System32\dns.exe" AND source.port:"53" AND Protocol:"udp")) OR (process.executable.text:("*\\Avast\ Software\\Avast\\AvastSvc.exe" OR "*\\Avast\\AvastSvc.exe")) OR (process.executable.text:"*\\RDCMan.exe") OR (process.executable.text:"C:\Program Files\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe") OR (((*\FSAssessment.exe*) OR (*\FSDiscovery.exe*) OR (*\MobaRTE.exe*) OR (*\mRemote.exe*) OR (*\mRemoteNG.exe*) OR (*\Passwordstate.exe*) OR (*\RemoteDesktopManager.exe*) OR (*\RemoteDesktopManager64.exe*) OR (*\RemoteDesktopManagerFree.exe*) OR (*\RSSensor.exe*) OR (*\RTS2App.exe*) OR (*\RTSApp.exe*) OR (*\spiceworks-finder.exe*) OR (*\Terminals.exe*) OR (*\ws_TunnelService.exe*))) OR (process.executable.text:("*\\thor.exe" OR "*\\thor64.exe")) OR (process.executable.text:"C\:\\Program\ Files\\SplunkUniversalForwarder\\bin\\*") OR (process.executable.text:"*\\Ranger\\SentinelRanger.exe") OR (process.executable.text:"C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe") OR (NOT _exists_:process.executable.text) OR (process.executable.text:"") OR (process.executable.text:"<unknown process>"))))
